episodes.title: Ryomen Sukuna
episodes.plot: As Itadori cares for his grandpa, Fushiguro worries that he's carrying a cursed object of rare power. The Occult club messes with something far beyond their understanding.

episodes.title: For Myself
episodes.plot: Following the delay of his secret execution, Yuji is brought to Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical School. He's interviewed by the principal, who tests his convictions to see if he's worthy of becoming a sorcerer.

episodes.title: Girl of Steel
episodes.plot: A new freshman arrives to join the Itadori and Fushiguro group. She barely arrives in Tokyo, and is already put to the test on her first exorcism mission.

episodes.title: Curse Womb Must Die
episodes.plot: The three Jujutsu first years are sent to rescue inmates of a detention center haunted by a Cursed Womb. With the potential to spawn a Special Grade Cursed Spirit, the young Sorcerers are faced with the choice to run or die.

episodes.title: Curse Womb Must Die -II-
episodes.plot: Yuuji fails to regain control of his own body, forcing Fushiguro to take drastic measures. Meanwhile, the school's veterans finally introduce themselves.

episodes.title: After Rain
episodes.plot: Yuji and Sukuna have a conversation outside the material plane, while Gojo expresses his desire to bring about a revolution in the Jujutsu world - through education.

episodes.title: Assault
episodes.plot: While in transit, Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special-grade cursed spirit, Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit, Jogo comes face-to-face with Gojo's strength.

episodes.title: Boredom
episodes.plot: Kugisaki and Fushiguro continue to prepare for the Exchange Event, but some visitors from Kyoto decide to jump the gun and test their colleagues in the capital.

episodes.title: Small Fry and Reverse Retribution
episodes.plot: Junpei is a fragile boy, who suffers at school, and who is about to find refuge in the world of curses. Meanwhile, Yuuji investigates murders alongside a new partner: Nanami.

episodes.title: Idle Transfiguration
episodes.plot: Itadori's assignment is to investigate whether or not Junpei possesses sorcerer potential or is just an ordinary person. If he shows he has potential, he is to bring him in for questioning. Kento confronts the curse that is guiding Junpei.

episodes.title: Narrow-minded
episodes.plot: Kento's fight with the curse that is manipulating Junpei goes into overtime. Itadori makes contact with Junpei.

episodes.title: To You, Someday
episodes.plot: Yuji tries to reach what's left of Junpei's heart with both his fists and his words.

episodes.title: Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Yuji and Kento continue their battle against Mahito, who develops his powers in unexpected ways.

episodes.title: Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event - Group Battle 0 -
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the battle with Mahito, both sides have returned to their usual routines. Yuji finally goes back to school, but his surprise return doesn't exactly go over well with his peers.

episodes.title: Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event - Group Battle 1 -
episodes.plot: Itadori Yuji and the rest of Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical School engage into their team battle against their sister school from Kyoto. However with the entire Kyoto team against Yuji, will he be able to last with his short training?

episodes.title: Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event - Group Battle 2 -
episodes.plot: Aoi Todo and Itadori Yuji continue to battle it out, with the former determined to strengthen his new best friend. Meanwhile, Panda discovers Ultimate Mechamaru's secrets while showing a more powerful side of him during their battle

episodes.title: Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event - Group Battle 3 -
episodes.plot: Miwa and Maki engage in a battle of strength while Nishimiya tackles Nobara. The battle is interrupted by Mai and the twins battle it out revealing secrets about their clan.

episodes.title: Sage
episodes.plot: Megumi and Noritoshi confront their similarities and differences through battle. However, the Goodwill Event is suddenly upheaved by a sudden invasion!

episodes.title: Black Flash
episodes.plot: The special grade cursed spirit Hanami has invaded the Goodwill Event! Can the students survive the onslaught and escape the curtain with their lives?

episodes.title: Nonstandard
episodes.plot: Yuji and Todo continue their battle with the special grade curse. Satoru finds a way to enter the battlefield.

episodes.title: Jujutsu Koshien
episodes.plot: After the events interruption, the school tournament continues with a baseball match.

episodes.title: The Origin of Blind Obedience
episodes.plot: Megumi, Nobara, and Yuji are sent out to investigate the mysterious deaths connected to the Saitama Urami East Junior High. Meanwhile, Mahito and Geto continue their schemes, incarnating one of the Cursed Womb: Death Paintings.

episodes.title: The Origin of Blind Obedience - 2 -
episodes.plot: The battle begins, and the group is split. Fighting a familiar foe, Megumi uses a new technique, and reflects on his past. Nobara and Yuji fight Cursed Womb: Death Paintings Kechizu and Eso.

episodes.title: Accomplices
episodes.plot: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki--however, the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu.
